name: Tenebris
relicBonuses: This relic and its bearer deal damage as if they are strong against the enemy's class.
The bearer can equip {CLASS_Chaos} Spell Gems.
The bearer takes damage as if it is strong against the enemy's class.
The bearer can equip {CLASS_Life} Spell Gems.
After the bearer {ACTION_casts} a spell, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
The bearer can equip {CLASS_Nature} Spell Gems.
At the start of battle, the bearer's class is changed to that of the top-most Spell Gem it has equipped.
The bearer can equip {CLASS_Death} Spell Gems.
After the bearer {ACTION_casts} a spell, this relic has a 10% chance to {ACTION_cast} each of the bearer's permanent spells that do not belong to its class.
The bearer can equip {CLASS_Sorcery} Spell Gems.
title: God of Blood
